resources.string:
1)Click on the Set Password, enter password in below textbox and click on save.(remember password)

 2)SMS Format: profile_code password

 3)Profile Codes:
 			Normal:@normal
 			Silent:@silent
 			Vibrate:@vibrate
 			Wifi On:@wifion
 			Wifi Off:@wifioff
 			Bluetooth On:@bluetoothon
 			Bluetooth Off:@bluetoothoff

 4)Password:the password you set earlier.
